channel.title: VI on Home
channel.description: Recent content in VI on Home

item.title: Tier VI statistics
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier VI during update 6.8. Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.8. On average, players played 63 battles. Median was 25 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.8 was 3532 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.

item.title: Tier VI statistics
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier VI during update 6.9. Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.9. On average, players played 68 battles. Median was 29 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.9 was 3350 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.

item.title: Tier VI Tanks
item.description: Highest Average WR This graph shows the tanks with the highest average WR at tier VI during update 6.8. Player WR denotes the tank’s players’ average WR across all the tanks during the update. Only tanks with more than 50 players are listed. This may filter out few upcoming tanks that are being tested. Highest Average WR - Table Average WR denotes average WR in a tank accross all the players during the update.

item.title: Tier VI Tanks
item.description: Highest Average WR This graph shows the tanks with the highest average WR at tier VI during update 6.9. Player WR denotes the tank’s players’ average WR across all the tanks during the update. Only tanks with more than 50 players are listed. This may filter out few upcoming tanks that are being tested. Highest Average WR - Table Average WR denotes average WR in a tank accross all the players during the update.
